question: The Prime Minister is to launch the Distribution of Property Cards under which scheme?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is to launch the physical distribution of property cards under the SVAMITVA (Survey of Villages and Mapping with Improvised Technology in Village Areas) scheme.
Under the scheme, the rural people are empowered to use the property as a financial asset. The physical copies of property titles will be handed over to over 132,000 landowners during the event. The state governments will also physically distribute the cards to people.
